alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 1:52AM CDT until March 17 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hardin County in southeastern Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 152 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thicket, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kountze, Saratoga, Thicket, Bevil Oaks, Batson, Votaw, Honey Island, Village Mills and Caney Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
